attributes.action: Award the discloser of the MP's expences an OBE for services to the Britsih people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the unknown 'leak' who showed us all what was happening with our tax money is rewarded for the outcome of their actions, GIVEN THAT the official disclosures were censured to specifically avoid the exact results that were obtained

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
